articles.title: Immigration Raid on Hyundai-LG Plant in Georgia Rattles South Korea
articles.description: A major immigration raid at a Hyundai manufacturing plant in Georgia resulted in the arrest of 475 workers, causing significant concern and anger in South Korea, whose government has pledged support for its detained citizens.

articles.title: Surfer dead after mauling by large shark off Australia beach
articles.description: A 57-year-old surfer was fatally attacked by a large shark while in the water with friends off the coast of northern Sydney, prompting the closure of nearby beaches.

articles.title: Defending champion Eagles edge Cowboys 24-20 in wild, lightning-delayed NFL season opener
articles.description: The Philadelphia Eagles began their title defense with a narrow 24-20 victory over the Dallas Cowboys in a season opener that was delayed by lightning.
